name: immodestly
content:
immodestly adverb
(PROUDLY)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that shows you have too high an opinion of yourself: The promotional material immodestly describes it as the most important film of the decade. I would immodestly recommend my own book.
More examplesFewer examplesThere's a white-sand beach with shallow, clean waters that are described immodestly by the authorities as the most beautiful in the world.His autobiography immodestly refers to him as "a legend".

(OF CLOTHING)
